content: this legal text discusses the progress of a divorce case involving two individuals mr x and an undisclosed party the text provides information about the parties involved their marriage and the laws applicable to their divorce it then goes on to discuss the divorce proceedings including initial claims and counterclaims the agreement to divorce and the courts decision to grant the divorce the text also focuses on the liquidation and partition of the matrimonial property regime involving the appointment of a notary and the request for information and documents from the parties the document mentions the costs associated with the liquidation process additionally it mentions the details of a multiunit apartment building and a garage including cadastral information and income the parties agree that the property effects of the divorce will date back to august 14 2017 the text concludes by stating that no further declarations were made and the session is closed the parties are required to fulfill the execution terms and conditions and provide their residence for notifications and service they have instructed a notary to appoint a company to determine the market rental value of a property with the costs to be split between the parties the next meeting is scheduled for monday 9122019 at 130 pm and the minutes of the meeting were read and signed by the parties involved
